languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили вокс-сообщение с Футфола. На данной станции ввиду угрозы Маллеус Экстремис указом Инквизиции введено военное положение. Стыковка судов требует особого разрешения, большая часть астероидов оцеплена".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили вокс-сообщение с Футфола. На данной станции ввиду угрозы Маллеус Экстремис указом Инквизиции введено военное положение. Стыковка судов требует особого разрешения, большая часть астероидов оцеплена".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили вокс-сообщение с Футфола. На данной станции ввиду угрозы Маллеус Экстремис указом Инквизиции введено военное положение. Стыковка судов требует особого разрешения, большая часть астероидов оцеплена".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law at the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. The docking requires special permission and most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law at the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. The docking requires special permission and most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message-vox de Castel. En réponse à la menace du Malleus Extremis, l'Inquisition a décrété la loi martiale sur toute la station. Nous aurons besoin d'une autorisation spéciale pour accoster, et la plupart des astéroïdes tombent également sous le coup de l'interdiction. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message-vox de Castel. En réponse à la menace du Malleus Extremis, l'Inquisition a décrété la loi martiale sur toute la station. Nous aurons besoin d'une autorisation spéciale pour accoster, et la plupart des astéroïdes tombent également sous le coup de l'interdiction. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自落脚港的音阵信息。审判庭宣布，由于发生了‘重大恶魔威胁’，整座星站已经实施戒严。靠港的舰船需要特别许可，甚至周围绝大部分小行星都被封锁了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自落脚港的音阵信息。审判庭宣布，由于发生了‘重大恶魔威胁’，整座星站已经实施戒严。靠港的舰船需要特别许可，甚至周围绝大部分小行星都被封锁了。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Nachricht von Footfall erhalten. Die Inquisition hat auf der Station das Kriegsrecht verhängt, wegen der Bedrohung durch Malleus Extremis. Man darf nur mit Sondergenehmigung andocken, und sogar die meisten Asteroiden wurden abgesperrt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Nachricht von Footfall erhalten. Die Inquisition hat auf der Station das Kriegsrecht verhängt, wegen der Bedrohung durch Malleus Extremis. Man darf nur mit Sondergenehmigung andocken, und sogar die meisten Asteroiden wurden abgesperrt."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje de voco proveniente de Paso. Al verse amenazados por Malleus Extremis, la Inquisición ha declarado la ley marcial en la estación. Necesitaremos un permiso especial para atracar, y han acordonado la mayoría de los asteroides».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje de voco proveniente de Paso. Al verse amenazados por Malleus Extremis, la Inquisición ha declarado la ley marcial en la estación. Necesitaremos un permiso especial para atracar, y han acordonado la mayoría de los asteroides».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、フットフォールからヴォクスメッセージが届いています。マレウス・エクストレミスの恐れがあるため、異端審問庁がステーションに戒厳令を出しました。ドッキングには特別な許可が必要で、ほとんどの小惑星が封鎖されています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、フットフォールからヴォクスメッセージが届いています。マレウス・エクストレミスの恐れがあるため、異端審問庁がステーションに戒厳令を出しました。ドッキングには特別な許可が必要で、ほとんどの小惑星が封鎖されています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Binliman'dan voks mesajı ulaştı. Engizisyon, Malleus Extremis'in teşkil ettiği tehlikeden ötürü istasyonda sıkıyönetim ilan etmiş. Yanaşmak için hususi müsamaha talep etmemiz gerekiyor, hatta asteroitlerin çoğuna da giriş yahut çıkış yasaklanmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from Footfall. The Inquisition has declared martial law on the station due to the threat of Malleus Extremis. Docking will require special permission and even most of the asteroids have been cordoned off."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Binliman'dan voks mesajı ulaştı. Engizisyon, Malleus Extremis'in teşkil ettiği tehlikeden ötürü istasyonda sıkıyönetim ilan etmiş. Yanaşmak için hususi müsamaha talep etmemiz gerekiyor, hatta asteroitlerin çoğuna da giriş yahut çıkış yasaklanmış."
